moduleDescription: Reciprocating and turbine engines, fuel, ignition, lubrication, propellers, operation and fire protection.

sets.name: 01 – Reciprocating Engines
sets.subtitle: Piston engine construction, operating cycles, performance and troubleshooting.

sets.name: 02 – Fuel Systems & Metering
sets.subtitle: Fuel systems, carburetion, injection and mixture control.

sets.name: 03 – Induction & Exhaust
sets.subtitle: Induction systems, supercharging, turbocharging and exhaust.

sets.name: 04 – Ignition Systems
sets.subtitle: Magnetos, ignition harnesses, spark plugs and timing.

sets.name: 05 – Starting Systems
sets.subtitle: Electric, pneumatic and other starting systems.

sets.name: 06 – Lubrication & Cooling
sets.subtitle: Lubrication systems, oils, cooling and temperature control.

sets.name: 07 – Propellers
sets.subtitle: Fixed-pitch, variable-pitch, constant speed and propeller control.

sets.name: 08 – Engine Removal & Replacement
sets.subtitle: Engine removal, installation, alignment and related procedures.

sets.name: 09 – Fire Protection
sets.subtitle: Fire detection, extinguishing systems and fire hazards.

sets.name: 10 – Engine Operation & Maintenance
sets.subtitle: Engine operation, monitoring, troubleshooting and maintenance practices.

sets.name: 11 – LSA Engines
sets.subtitle: Light-sport aircraft engines, specific features and maintenance.

sets.name: 12 – Turbine Engines
sets.subtitle: Turbine engine theory, construction, operation and maintenance.

sets.name: 13 – Water Injection & Power Augmentation
sets.subtitle: Water/methanol injection and other power augmentation systems.
